title: [Large-scale] Role-Play-Based Case Learning for Enhancing Online Peer Feedback Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Peer feedback exchange competency development in mathematical problem-solving processes for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mathematical problem-solving cases with over 80% accuracy to identify issues and improvement points
Through role-play activities, learners generate at least three specific and actionable feedbacks on peers' problem-solving processes
Based on peer feedback, learners can revise their mathematical problem-solving strategies at least twice
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
